actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to permit the use of the golf course facilities at the Naval Ordnance Laboratory by individuals not in the employ of the laboratory.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of the golf course facilities at the Naval Ordnance Laboratory in White Oak, Maryland, by individuals not in the employ of the Laboratory, upon the payment of a reasonable fee by such individuals.

titles.title: A bill to permit the use of the golf course facilities at the Naval Ordnance Laboratory by individuals not in the employ of the laboratory.
